Pagan Dawn is a quarterly magazine covering nature-based spirituality, esoteric arts, history and the environment. It features articles, reviews and research, ranging from cutting-edge academic thought to people profiles of activists and volunteers.

Originally a newsletter entitled “The Wiccan”, Pagan Dawn has published continually since 1968, making it the longest running esoteric periodical in the world. It was later retitled, reflecting its coverage of all Pagan faiths.

Pagan Dawn is the journal of the Pagan Federation and reflects its aims in supporting all Pagans to ensure they have the same rights as the followers of other beliefs.
Exclusive to this online edition is “We Emerge”, a history of the Pagan Federation and features a reproduction of the very first “The Wiccan” newsletter.
